Sign in to sync your data across multiple devices
This may result in data charges. Continue anyway?
Sync unsuccessful (Another device is currently syncing…)

### Please keep the following points in mind when syncing multiple devices:

 * The current device provides the timestamp for synchronisation

 * You can store as much data as your preferred cloud backup service allows

 * When a conflict exists between data on your current device and the cloud backup, the conflict is resolved by comparing the last modified time. The most recent will overwrite the oldest

 * Some conflicts cannot be resolved automatically (for example, an item was renamed on one device but the duplicate exists on another device). This will have to be resolved manually

 * On some devices, you might have to turn off battery optimizations for the auto sync feature to work reliably.
Turn off battery optimizations for auto sync

Is Incognito not working? Please manually enable the \'cct-incognito-available-to-third-party\' flag by visiting chrome://flags in the Chrome browser. Click to copy the URL.

Incognito mode might not work correctly in Chrome without a required flag. Please manually enable the \'cct-incognito-available-to-third-party\' flag by visiting chrome://flags in the Chrome browser. Copy the flag URL, launch Chrome browser on your device, visit the copied link, and set the required flag.

Your all-in-one solution for collecting and managing digital content
Save any digital content from any app or browser in one secure place
Create nested collections, add notes, tags, highlights, annotations, and custom states to keep your bookmarks organized
AI categorization, dashboard widgets, and floating bubbles make bookmarking effortless
Your data stays on your device with optional secure cloud sync and device lock protection
Revisit the app introduction and features
Let AI automatically categorize and tag your bookmarks for effortless organization
Quick access to your collections and recent bookmarks right from your home screen
Save content instantly with floating bubbles that work across all your apps
Access your bookmarks from your computer

Customize how many items to show per page
Get notified when bookmarks are about to expire

Access and manage your bookmarks directly from your computer over local Wi-Fi.

**Features:**

* Access bookmarks from your computer
* Manage bookmarks from your computer
* Sync bookmarks between devices

**How to Use:**

1. Connect your phone and computer to the same Wi-Fi network
2. Open the app on your phone
3. Click the "Connect to PC" button
4. Follow the on-screen instructions

This feature makes it easy to manage your bookmarks from your computer.

Create dynamic collections that automatically organize your bookmarks.

**Features:**

* Create collections based on rules
* Automatically add bookmarks to collections
* Update collections in real-time

**How to Use:**

1. Click the "Create Smart Collection" button
2. Set up rules for your collection
3. Save the collection
4. Bookmarks will be automatically added to the collection

This feature helps you keep your bookmarks organized.

Secure sensitive bookmarks with authentication.

**Features:**

* Lock collections with a password
* Hide collections from view
* Require authentication to access

**How to Use:**

1. Create a new collection
2. Click the lock icon
3. Set a password
4. Save the collection

This feature helps you keep your sensitive bookmarks secure.

Customize how many bookmarks are displayed per page.

**Features:**

* Set the number of bookmarks per page
* Choose from preset options
* Save your preferences

**How to Use:**

1. Go to Settings
2. Click on "Custom Pagination"
3. Choose the number of bookmarks per page
4. Save your preferences

This feature helps you customize your browsing experience.

Set reminders for important bookmarks.

**Features:**

* Set reminders for bookmarks
* Choose from preset options
* Get notifications when reminders are due

**How to Use:**

1. Open a bookmark's settings/popup menu
2. Select "Set Reminder"
3. Choose when to be reminded
4. Save the reminder

This feature helps you remember important bookmarks.

Get notified when bookmarks are about to expire.

**Features:**

* Set expiration dates for bookmarks
* Get notifications when bookmarks are about to expire
* Choose from preset options

**How to Use:**

1. Open a bookmark's settings/popup menu
2. Select "Set Expiry"
3. Choose when the bookmark should expire
4. Save the expiration date

This feature helps you keep track of expiring bookmarks.

Create and manage custom statuses for your bookmarks.

**Features:**

* Create custom statuses
* Assign statuses to bookmarks
* Filter bookmarks by status

**How to Use:**

1. Open a bookmark's popup menu
2. Select "Add/Edit Status"
3. For pro users, click the "Custom Status" button to create new statuses
4. Assign the status to bookmarks

This feature helps you organize your bookmarks by custom status.

Monitor your bookmark statistics with analytics widgets.

**Features:**

* View bookmark statistics
* Customize widgets
* Share statistics
* Unlimited dashboard widgets (regular users limited to 25)

**How to Use:**

1. Go to the Dashboard
2. Click the "Add Widget" button
3. Choose a widget type
4. Customize the widget

This feature helps you monitor your bookmark usage with unlimited widget capacity.

Save unlimited search queries for quick access.

**Features:**

* Save unlimited search queries (regular users limited to 2)
* Organize searches
* Share searches

**How to Use:**

1. Perform a search
2. Click the "Save Search" button
3. Name your search
4. Save the search

This feature helps you quickly access your favorite searches without any limits.

Restore deleted items from the trash.

**Features:**

* Restore deleted items (bookmarks, collections, sources, notes, tags, and dashboard widgets)
* View deleted items
* Permanently delete items
* Choose retention period (7 days, 30 days, 90 days, or indefinite)

**How to Use:**

1. Go to the Trash
2. Click on a deleted item
3. Click the "Restore" button
4. The item will be restored to its original location

This feature helps you recover accidentally deleted items and provides a safety net for your data.

Automated backups of your bookmarks.

**Features:**

* Automatic backups
* Choose backup frequency
* Restore from backups

**How to Use:**

1. Go to Settings
2. Click on "Backups"
3. Choose backup frequency
4. Save your preferences

This feature helps you keep your bookmarks safe.
Create, edit, and organize bookmarks with automatic or manual saving from any app or browser
Organize bookmarks in nested collections for better organization and quick access
Add detailed notes with markdown support and organize with custom tags
Powerful search across all bookmarks with advanced filtering and sorting options
Import bookmarks from browsers and export to various formats including JSON, HTML, and TXT
Quick access to bookmarks with a floating bubble that stays on top of other apps
Add bookmarks and collections to your home screen as shortcuts or widgets
Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable reading in any environment
Optional sync to Google Drive to keep your bookmarks backed up and accessible
Explore all the features of the app

Create and manage bookmarks with ease.

**Features:**

* Create bookmarks from any app or browser
* Multiple sharing options
* Edit bookmark details
* Organize in collections

**How to Use:**

1. Share URL to SmarterBookmarks from any app
2. Choose your preferred sharing behavior:
 
	* Save bookmark: Saves directly without editing
	* Save bookmark…: Opens editor for manual editing
	* Save and open bookmark: Saves and opens immediately


 #### 
3. Edit title, URL, and other details (if manual editing)
4. Add to collections for organization

Organize your bookmarks in nested collections.

**Features:**

* Create nested collections
* Quick access to collections
* Custom collection icons
* Pin important collections
* Archive collections
* Add collections to home screen as widgets

**How to Use:**

1. Create a new collection
2. Add bookmarks to collections
3. Create sub-collections for better organization
4. Access collections from the main screen
5. Pin frequently used collections
6. Archive collections you don't need right now
7. Add collections as widgets to your home screen

Add detailed notes and tags to your bookmarks.

**Features:**

* Markdown support for notes
* Custom tags
* Tag-based filtering
* Pin important notes
* Color-coded notes

**How to Use:**

1. Add notes to bookmarks
2. Use markdown for formatting
3. Create and apply tags
4. Filter by tags
5. Pin frequently used notes
6. Color-code notes for better organization

Find your content quickly with powerful search and filtering across Bookmarks, Collections, Notes, Tags, and Sources.

**Features:**

**Basic Filters**
* Favorites/Non-Favorites
* Pinned/Unpinned
* AND/OR search terms

**Bookmarks**
* Filter by status (Active/Inactive, Read/Unread)
* In/Not in Collection
* Tagged/Untagged
* Dynamic/Non-Dynamic
* Search by Title, URL, Description, Domain

**Collections**
* Search within current folder
* Include subcollections
* Collections Only/Bookmarks Only
* Filter bookmarks by Title, URL, Description, Domain

**Notes**
* Tagged/Untagged
* Favorites/Non-Favorites
* Pinned/Unpinned

**Advanced Search**
* Exact match
* Exclude terms
* Regular expressions
* Quick regex operators

**How to Use:**

1. Use the search bar to find content
2. Apply filters to narrow down results
3. Use advanced search for precise filtering
4. Combine multiple filters for complex searches
5. Save your favorite search combinations

Import and export your bookmarks with multiple format options.

**Features:**

* Import from HTML, JSON, TXT, and CSV
* Export to HTML, JSON, TXT, and CSV
* HTML export optimization options
* Export/import app settings
* Batch operations
* Backup and restore functionality

**How to Use:**

1. Import bookmarks from supported formats
2. Choose export format based on your needs
3. Use HTML optimization for better compatibility
4. Export/import app settings when needed
5. Create regular backups of your data

Quick access to bookmarks with floating bubble.

**Features:**

* Always-on-top bubble
* Quick bookmark access
* Customizable position
* Easy dismissal

**How to Use:**

1. Grant permission to draw over other apps
2. Select 'Open bubble' from bookmark popup menu
3. Drag to position
4. Tap bubble to open bookmark
5. Swipe to dismiss

Add bookmarks and collections to your home screen.

**Features:**

* Collection widgets and shortcuts
* Bookmark shortcuts
* Custom widget sizes
* Quick access to bookmarks

**How to Use:**

**For Bookmarks:**
1. Select 'Add to home screen' from bookmark menu
2. Place shortcut on home screen

**For Collections:**
1. Select 'Add to home screen' from collection menu
2. Choose widget or shortcut
3. Place on home screen
4. Customize widget size (if widget)

Switch between light and dark themes.

**Features:**

* Reduced eye strain
* Battery saving in dark mode
* Automatic dark mode with battery saver
* Seamless system theme integration

**How to Use:**

1. Go to Settings > Appearance
2. Choose theme option:
 
	- System default: Follows system theme
	- Light: Always light theme
	- Dark: Always dark theme
	- Battery saver: Dark when battery saver is on

Sync your bookmarks with Google Drive.

**Features:**

* Google Drive integration
* Flexible sync schedules (15 min to 7 days)
* WiFi-only sync option
* Sync on app launch
* Manual sync anytime
* Battery optimization settings
* Sync status and logs

**How to Use:**

1. Go to Settings > Cloud Sync
2. Enable sync and sign in with Google Drive
3. Choose sync frequency:
	- 15 minutes
	- 1 hour
	- 3 hours
	- 6 hours
	- 12 hours
	- 24 hours
	- 7 days
4. Select network preference:
	- Any network
	- WiFi only
5. Enable sync on launch if desired
6. Check sync status and logs for details

New: Added dedicated sections in Settings to showcase and explain app and Pro features
Pro: Enhanced Connect to PC feature with a modern and intuitive interface

New: Added text highlighting and annotation capabilities in the in-app browser and article mode
Added reader mode to the in-app browser to make articles easier to read by removing distractions and optimizing text layout
Redesigned the app UI with improved navigation and visual hierarchy
Added image resizing controls in the bookmarks tab for better visual customization

Create unlimited highlights and annotations in your bookmarks and web content

Create and manage unlimited highlights and annotations in your bookmarks and web content.

**Features:**

* Create unlimited highlights in your bookmarks
* Add unlimited annotations per bookmark or URL (regular users limited to 2)
* Organize and search through your highlights and annotations
* Export your highlights and annotations for reference
* Color-code your highlights for better organization
* Access highlights from the bookmark details view
* Highlight text from any URL, even without creating a bookmark

**How to Use:**

1. Open a bookmark in the in-app browser or article mode
2. Select the text you want to highlight
3. Choose a highlight color from the color picker
4. Add annotations to your highlights (optional)
5. View and manage all highlights from the bookmark details view
6. Export highlights and annotations when needed

This feature helps you better organize and remember important information from your bookmarks and web content.
Added bookmark creation and random bookmark in the collections tab
Fixed in-app browser jitter when scrolling
Fixed collection label clipping when moving collections or adding bookmarks

Reminder set to the earliest of selected date and until date
Prevents showing toasts for sync start, completion, or errors.
Pull down and hold for 1 second to refresh all list data if something seems out of date or not syncing properly.
Pro: Added recurring bookmark reminders with improved reminder functionality
Added a tool to clear expired bookmark reminders

Added option to suppress cloud sync toast notifications
Added deep refresh functionality in behavior settings
Other bug fixes and performance improvements

Automatically remove the notification when tapped

Improved database import with progress updates, large file support, and clearer feedback

Added full text search and content search (Pro)
Optimized app memory usage and responsiveness
Enables faster, smarter search across your content. May use more storage.
Uses basic pattern matching with lower storage use.
Includes saved page text in search results. May increase storage use. Affects new and refreshed bookmarks.
Page content won\'t be included in search.

**Introduction**: Full-text search allows you to search through all your content quickly and efficiently. It indexes your data to provide faster search results.

**Search Tips**:
- Use specific keywords to narrow down results.
- Combine keywords with logical operators like OR for broader searches.
- Use quotes to search for exact phrases.
- Use `-` to exclude terms from your search.
- Use `*` as a wildcard to match any sequence of characters.
- Use `NEAR` to find words that are close to each other in the text.
- Search within specific fields using `name:term`.
- Use parentheses for grouping terms and operators.

**Examples**:
- Searching for `project OR deadline` will return items containing either term.
- "meeting notes" will return items with the exact phrase.
- `project -completed` will return items containing "project" but not "completed".
- `dev*` will match any word starting with "dev", such as "development" or "developer".
- `project NEAR deadline` will find items where "project" and "deadline" are close to each other.
- `name:project` will search for "project" only within the name field.
- `(project OR task) deadline` will group "project" or "task" with "deadline".

**Additional Information**: Enabling full-text search may increase storage usage but provides a more powerful search experience.
Bug fixes from the previous update, including issues with editing bookmarks and selecting a collection in the dropdown
The collection dropdown menu is now searchable
Choose how to handle duplicate data during import
Added option to replace duplicates when importing data

Search through the actual content of your bookmarks and web pages.

**Features:**

* Search through full webpage content
* Find text in cached pages
* Search in offline content
* Advanced content filtering

**How to Use:**

1. Enter your search query
2. Enable content search option
3. View results with highlighted matches
4. Filter results by content type

This feature helps you find exactly what you're looking for within your bookmarked content.
Search through the actual content of your bookmarks
Added ability to search within bookmark content with highlighted matches (Pro)
Reorganized bookmark menu into logical groups for easier access
Added a visual indicator to show when bookmarks have searchable content
Improved bookmark metadata refresh performance and reliability
Fixed bookmarks not showing the latest changes during cloud sync

Create unlimited connections between related bookmarks

Create unlimited connections between related bookmarks to organize your knowledge and discover relationships.

**Features:**

* Create unlimited bookmark links (regular users limited to 3)
* Bidirectional relationships between bookmarks
* Visual graph view of bookmark connections
* List view for easy management
* Search and filter linked bookmarks
* Export bookmark relationships
* Navigate between related bookmarks seamlessly

**How to Use:**

1. Select a bookmark and tap the link icon
2. Choose bookmarks to link from the selection dialog
3. View all linked bookmarks in the relationship review panel
4. Switch between list and graph views
5. Remove links by tapping the unlink button
6. Navigate to linked bookmarks directly from the relationship view

This feature helps you organize related information and discover connections between your bookmarks.
Added linked bookmarks feature to create connections between related bookmarks
Added more translations - Čeština, Dansk, Suomi, 한국어, Slovenčina and Українська
Added ability to select custom images when creating new bookmarks
Fixed search in other bookmark views to allow filtering by tags and collections
